skillTree.localised_description: Once broken into service, a gnoblar will send his Sabretusk to chase down vulnerable or wounded victims, or simply use it as a mount.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit can fire while on the move.

skillTree.localised_description: This one has guts – quite literally. A surfeit of stomach in fact, you might say, but also the confidence to back up his bulk.
Stumpy and short-witted as they are, these Gnoblars have an eye on the sky at all times.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: When the beast master says jump, his pets only wait to hear how high.

effects.description:
Attribute: Immune to Psychology for Sabretusk Pack units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

skillTree.localised_description: "How does one combat a pack of angry, charging Sabretusks?" is a question usually asked moments before tragedy.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%

Passive ability: "Frenzy" for Sabretusk Pack units
	(Hero's army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Spend enough time in the wilderness and you'll soon start to become one with nature.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20

Passive ability: "Primal Instincts" for Yhetees units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: It's hard to shelter from missile fire when projectiles are being launched with enough force to impale a particularly sturdy tree.

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Well-trained Sabretusks can roam freely, prowling the land for their next unsuspecting meal.

effects.description:
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Sabretusk Pack units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: The best way to eliminate a target is to violently crush their skull before they even notice you're there.

effects.description:
Attribute: Stalk for Sabretusk Pack units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: "Run! RUN! Oh gods, they're coming right at us!"

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

Passive ability: "Frenzy" for Rhinox Riders units
	(Hero's army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

skillTree.localised_description: No beast is too big to be brought to its knees. More meat on its bones is simply more meat for the feast!

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Sabretusk Pack, Rhinox Riders, Yhetees and Giant units
	(Hero's army)

Upkeep: -10% for Sabretusk Pack, Rhinox Riders, Yhetees and Giant units
	(Hero's army)

attributes.bullet_text: When this unit gets hurt it may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.

skillTree.localised_description: Never one to run with the crowd, this one likes to sneak about in front by themselves and surprise the foe.

enabled_if: No friendly units in ability range.

skillTree.localised_description: This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!
Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
The fastest knife thrower in the camp. Blink and you're already dead.
Delighting in death and suffering, nothing is more fun for a gnoblar than poking dead things with a big stick.
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

attributes.bullet_text: When this unit gets hurt it may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit can fire while on the move.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
Though they risk killing the Ogres directly behind them, those fighters who like it spicy can propel themselves further with gassy emanations following a hearty meal.
The more meat you eat, the stronger and fatter you become, and therefore the harder you are to move from your chosen position.
There may or may not be a height difference between this one and his Ogreish colleagues, but in stature on the battlefield the divergence is most stark.
"Remember, lads, when Great Maw came 'e ate the night, shook the ground and burnt it with fire. That is 'oo we serve, not sum uvver power."
Once valuable scrap is acquired, this one will jealously guard it from rivals' eyes.
